Hello, I appreciate the detailed instructions you have provided. However, I have been unsuccessful in getting my PC activated over phone.

1) I used one of the listed keys listed under the phone activation method using the slmgr.vbs -ipk command.

2) It took the product key and I attempted to activate by phone.

3) I am from India, I first tried the Indian toll free number. Entered the 9 sets of digits very carefully.

4) The IVR couldn't validate it stating that something went wrong.

5) I don't know if it is a problem with key or a problem with Indian activation phone line.

6) I don't know how to change the key. I ran the slmgr.vbs -ipk with new key in the list and it errored out.

7) I tried calling the US activation phone number through my regular phone (i dont have a headset/mic handy) displayed in the activation screen. The IVR couldn't activate it and tried to transfer to a live person, I disconnected the call.

Can you please suggest a way to activate this installation please? Can you may be email a key that will work for sure, so that I don't have to stay on an international call multiple times.

Thank you.

@Halloweenpsycho

Thanks...
